>  I guess it [would] be reasonable to try it myself lmao.

:)

It's no problem. I was just wondering if you had tried it already and failed.

---
When looking for info, you can search the forum using the Google site search thingy at the bottom of the Forums page:

https://textadventures.co.uk/forum

---
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/117523200-10a5b480-af7d-11eb-8dc9-850da4719b74.png)

---
Just make sure you're clicking on results that concern Squiffy and not Quest.

NOTE: In this case, the search doesn't return anything worth note. So, trying it with this issue is a waste of time, but the forum's search results are usually quite enlightening (even if the search method ***sucks*** -- it's a little hard to see the results and it's a bit of a pain to navigate through them).

---
> Ok, so no it doesn't work but would there be a site I can just upload an image to that would give me a valid link?

Dang it! I was hoping it would work.

I've never used it, but most people around here recommend Imgur. They say it's totally free to set up an account and use it.

Alternatively, you can set up a GitHub account (if you don't already have one), and you can copy images, paste into a Gist comment, and it will magically turn into a markdown link which you can copy and paste here.

That's how I did the screenshot in this post.

This is the text GitHub magically inserted in the comment field when I took a screen shot and hit **CTRL+V** in the comment field:

```![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/117523200-10a5b480-af7d-11eb-8dc9-850da4719b74.png)```

That is Markdown. You can copy the bit from inside the ```()``` and you have the link:

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/117523200-10a5b480-af7d-11eb-8dc9-850da4719b74.png

Markdown should work in Squiffy (I think), but you can use that link to do it HTML-style:

```<image src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/117523200-10a5b480-af7d-11eb-8dc9-850da4719b74.png"/>```

---
<image src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/117523200-10a5b480-af7d-11eb-8dc9-850da4719b74.png"/>
